name: Kuri-Bob's Strange Adventure
description:
A little chestnut named Kuri-Bob lives an ordinary life inside his little cottage. He likes to practice wielding the axe (even though he has no arms) and he is good friends with the mail dove, Lazuli. However, one day he receives a strange book in the mail that sends both him and his birdie friend on a rather strange adventure. A flash of light and bam! Bob is transported to a dark, winter counterpart of his immediate area, with Lazuli nowhere in sight!

With the help of a mysterious orange cat named Triki, will Kuri-Bob find his friend and get home safely? Or will he succumb to the cold darkness of the In-Between?

(Made for my game dev class!)
